nodes.text: The Quell system was an Outer Rim star system that contained the planet Quell. Throughout the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems, the system was contested by both sides of the war, and served as the site of the Battle of Quell in 21 BBY. The Providence-class Dreadnought Lucid Voice also saw action in the system during the war.
The Quell system first appeared in "Jedi Crash", the thirteenth episode of the animated television series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' first season, which originally aired on January 16, 2009.
